description:
Kids Puzzle 2-in-1 bundle offers unique, fun, and relaxing jigsaw puzzles! 

This bundle consists of Kids: Zoo Puzzle and Kids: Farm Puzzle games, and in them you will find:

- 3 difficulties
- Kids friendly color palette
- Animated reward effects
- Relaxing background music

Start your matching adventure now!
name: Kids Puzzle - 2 in 1 Bundle
intro: Classic jigsaw puzzles for fun and relaxation!
